also need void and where to put and ipban code

item.title: ::starter ::ipban
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Murd3r Mod Murd3r
item.description:
@Mod_Murd3r wrote:

I’ll get them, 1 second[br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2007, 04:21:07 AM[/size][hr]Here is IP Ban

if (command.startsWith("ipban")){ String victim = command.substring(6); if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase("[Owner1]") || victim.equalsIgnoreCase("[Owner2]"))) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!"); } else { // Following is now done in appendToIp //PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; //System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is IP banning "+victim); //sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully IP banned"); appendToIp(p.playerName, p.connectedFrom, playerName, connectedFrom); }

Change [Owner1] to your name
and change [owner2] to co owners name.

I took this from the Enkrona source when they have it organised, you add the playerRights bit =-)

Starter:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 2000000); sendMessage("This is your starter pack. Enjoy your time here on [Servername]"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); } }

Hope I helped =-)

Read full topic
